snippet: Black and Hispanic teaching candidates have been passing an exam at lower rates than white applicants, prompting concerns of decreased diversity among teachers.
abstract: Federal Judge Kimba M Wood will review New York State teacher exam for signs that it is discriminatory against black and Hispanic applicants, who have been passing test at lower rates.
lead_paragraph: Black and Hispanic teaching candidates have been passing an exam at lower rates than white applicants, prompting concerns of decreased diversity among teachers.

headline.main: Questions of Bias Are Raised About a Teachers’ Exam in New York
headline.print_headline: Judge Raises Questions of Bias About a New Certification Exam for Teachers
